评论详情: I love the material this outfit is made out of . The color is an exact match to the picture. I was able to move around and stay cool while in Vegas . It fits comfortably. It is very stylish and I got a lot of complements. The material thickness is not too thin thick .
I recommend for all who love sets! so comfortable and cute for a quick effortless look. I'm 5'2 139lbs and ordered a small, it fit perfectly!

I’m 5’6, 182lbs, 38-32-45 I got a size large in the grey, baby pink, red and green and blue.  It fits so freaking well.  I’ve been hitting the gym and so this hugs my body so well. I went with the large.  The shorts had me worried at first since it only gives me about an inch worth of coverage right beneath my butt cheek. I wore it for a casual night out with friends and it held up to this horrible heat wave. It’s 86 degrees even in the middle of the night.  The shorts were not riding up at all and despite the middle seam on the shorts, zero camel toe.  It does show cellulite in the lighter colors so I would recommend you choose a darker color like black or grey to make it less noticeable.  The fabric is medium weight, elastic and breathable.  I paired mine with sneakers and a really cute purse. Accessories and how you pair it can really change how it looks.  At first you will feel odd as I felt it’s more suited for indoor use but I got so many compliments from my friends. That’s how I ended up with so many colors lol  Will soon wear the baby pink set with sneakers for an outdoor BBQ.  Just FYI, I’m wearing the blue set in this picture.
I love this outfit!! The sizing is a little weird, I wish the shirt was just a tad bigger, and the shorts get loose throughout the day but it's so comfortable

I initially ordered on 8/5, as we approach the fall I had to order 4 more. This little getup is definately worth the purchase. Material holds up in the wash, it is not thin but airy, sexy fit, soft and simply comfortable.
I love the color + material but it’s just a little too short for public comfort if you’re a thick girl with a butt :/ other than that i would give it a 5/5 but 3/5 bc i can only wear it to sleep.

Sooo soft and perfect in every way! I can't even tell you how many times I've worn and washed this in the past couple months of owning it and it is like brand new still. No piling or threads coming out! I'm 5'9" usually wear S/M and got a M. Fits like a glove! But if I lost or gained some lbs it would still fit because it's a really nice stretchy material. Just get it you won't regret it

First of all this took over a month to arrive, I almost forgot I ordered it. The color is more of a bright red which was not at all what I was looking for. Super cheap fabric, stitching is not clean, and the fit is horrible. The bottoms are very high wasted and I’m 5’9. If you are any shorter than 5’9, the shorts will be right under your bra line. The top was loose on the bottom and uncomfortably tight on the top, and I barely have an A cup. Wish I didn’t cut the tag off before trying it on. Not worth it at all.

Standing at a solid 180lbs 5'7 I ordered a Large, Could of gotten a Medium. The top fit fine but the shorts were more close to my knees, so I just rolled them up. Not see through, nice quality soft material.
Fit good..US 8 ordered M..thick material. Shorts are short and fitted..nice to lounge in..especially working from home make you feel sexy even though you're not dressed..
So comfortable and fits (xxs) 4’11 102lb  Love
